byline.contributor: David E. Sanger contributed reporting from Washington.

abstract: Sec of State John Kerry begins round of talks with Iranian officials in push to complete nuclear deal ahead of June 30 deadline; Obama administration believes deal is possible, but some experts have questioned wisdom of hard deadline.
lead_paragraph: With only a month to go before a deadline for finalizing a nuclear accord with Iran, Secretary of State John Kerry began a major push Saturday to conclude the agreement.

headline.main: Talks Begin to Conclude Nuclear Deal With Iran
headline.print_headline: U.S. Pushes to Conclude Nuclear Deal With Iran in High-Level Talks

snippet: With only a month to go before a deadline for finalizing a nuclear accord with Iran, Secretary of State John Kerry began a major push Saturday to conclude the agreement.
